milestones.description: Viv Richards has become the top scorer for WI in ODIs with 1278 runs, going past Greenidge's 1238
Kim Hughes and Bruce Laird's 147-run partnership is AUS's highest for the 4th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 117 between Doug Walters and Greg Chappell

stories.title: Why Bruce Laird's World Series knocks were as good as Test hundreds
stories.subTitle: Feature
stories.seoTitle: Ian Chappell - Why Bruce Laird's World Series knocks were as good as Test hundreds
stories.summary: The opener's gritty innings against Roberts, Holding and Co were worth their weight in gold, and his team-mates knew it

image.caption: Michael Holding stops a ball from Bruce Laird off his own bowling
image.longCaption: Michael Holding stops a ball from Bruce Laird off his own bowling, WSC Australia v WSC West Indies, second match, 1st day, RAS Showground, Sydney, December 16, 1977
